meanings.definition: Surgical reshaping of the cornea using a laser to correct vision.
meanings.sent1: The keratomileusis improved her eyesight significantly.
meanings.sent2: After the keratomileusis, she could see clearly without glasses.
meanings.sent3: The keratomileusis made her eyes feel like they had superpowers.
meanings.sent4: Her vision soared to new heights post-keratomileusis.
meanings.sent5: The keratomileusis transformed her blurry world into a crystal-clear paradise.

meanings.definition: The procedure of reshaping the cornea to correct refractive errors.
meanings.sent1: He underwent keratomileusis to fix his vision problems.
meanings.sent2: The keratomileusis successfully corrected his refractive errors.
meanings.sent3: The keratomileusis turned his eyes into precision tools.
meanings.sent4: After the keratomileusis, his eyesight was as sharp as a hawk's.
meanings.sent5: The keratomileusis was like a magic spell that banished his blurry vision.
